body_html:
In general i prefer to use cpp code only because i will need to create the net at runtime at cpp.

But i will happy to hear how to create the net correctly and find out what is the problem with my implementation.

I used caffe2 cpp tutorial, i also take a look on your demo code to see if i can use it in similar way
